segments.text: I'm honestly quite annoyed by the adult woman in this picture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly absorbed in a single task?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is literally pouring onto her feet, and she doesn't react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her complete lack of awareness is almost unbelievable to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a huge puddle growing, threatening to ruin the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just polishing that plate with unwavering concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And behind her, those kids are practically performing a circus act!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, I'm sure of it, and she won't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to tell her what's happening in her own kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like she’s living in a completely different reality right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and make her look down at her wet foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of negligence can lead to serious damage and injuries.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to watch these preventable problems unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm outside just makes her interior obliviousness even more irritating.
segments.speaker: PAR
